HPI 8607 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1991 Suzuka Super Touring Car 500km (JTC Round 2) Winner M. Hasemi/A. Olofsson

In 1991 Godzilla demolished the competition again. Skylines were the top finishers in all rounds:
Sugo: 1-2
Suzkua: 1-2-3
Tsukuba: 1-2-3-4
Sendai: 1-2-3-4
Autopolis: 1-2-3-4
Fuji: 1-2-3-4-5-6

This is the car Masahiro Hasemi & Anders Olofsson drove in round 2, the Suzuka Super Touring Car 500 km. They qualified in 2nd place and went on to win. Hasemi & Olofsson went on to win the 1991 championship outright.
